page.shortlink: api objects session object add method
page.description: Adds a named value to the session-state collection.
page.prototype: Context.Session.Add as V (Name as C, Value as A)

argument.name: Name as C
argument.description: The name of the session-state variable.

argument.name: Value as A
argument.description: The value of the session-state variable. Although type A, any type, is allowed it is deprecated for the value. The value should be of type C in order to support the most types of session-state providers under IIS.

page.discussion: Context.Session.Add() adds a named value to the session-state collection. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
